aboutThisProduct: The Aquaguard Aura 2X Life is an advanced water purifier that delivers exceptional purity by combining water saving RO technology, UV e-Boiling, and Taste Adjuster.
The all-new Dual Layer Filter Technology (DLFT) lasts for 2 years and ensures 50% water savings with the increased surface area of the RO membrane.
The patented Active Copper Technology enriches the water with the correct amount of copper, while UV e-boiling ensures purity equivalent to over 20 minutes of boiling.
keyPoints: No Service Required for 2 Years: Experience hassle-free maintenance with our advanced filters designed to last for 2 years.
Unconditional 2-Year Warranty: Enjoy complete peace of mind with a comprehensive 2-year warranty covering the product, including the RO membrane and all electrical components.
Water Saving RO Technology: Our cutting-edge water-saving technology conserves up to 50% of water.
